  1. io.netty.handler.codec.dns
  2. DnsRecord

Uses of Interface
io.netty.handler.codec.dns.DnsRecord

Packages that use DnsRecord
Package
Description
io.netty.handler.codec.dns
DNS codec.
io.netty.resolver.dns
An alternative to Java's built-in domain name lookup mechanism that resolves a domain name asynchronously, which supports the queries of an arbitrary DNS record type as well.

  • Uses of DnsRecord in io.netty.handler.codec.dns
